subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer shot a 10-under-par 62 to take a four-stroke lead after the first round of the Administaff Small Business Classic in Spring, Tex. Langer, playing his fourth Champions Tour event since turning 50 on Aug. 27, needed only 24 putts to match the best round of the season on the tour. He broke the Augusta Pines Golf Course record of 63 set by Jay Haas last year. Tom Kite pulled three strokes back of Langer with a birdie on the 17th hole, but a bogey on 18 dropped him into a tie for second at 66 with five others.
